actions.name: Tusk
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 STR save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If the boar takes 4 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 HP, it is reduced to 1 HP instead.
